1. Son of Norway’s crown princess charged with rape, sexual abuse  The Washington Post
  2. Son of Norway's crown princess, Marius Borg Hoiby, charged with 32 offenses, including 4 counts of rape  CBS News
  3. Crown Prince Haakon of Norway Breaks Silence After Stepson Is Accused of Rape and Faces 32 Charges  people.com
  4. Son of Norway princess charged with four rapes  yahoo.com
  5. Prosecutors indict the son of Norway’s crown princess on multiple counts including rape  CNN

item.title: Egypt mobilises 40,000 troops in Sinai amid Gaza displacement fears, source says - Middle East Eye
item.description:
1. Egypt mobilises 40,000 troops in Sinai amid Gaza displacement fears, source says  Middle East Eye
  2. Egypt warns Israel that mass displacement of Gazans is a ‘red line’  CNN
  3. In Rafah, Egypt and the PA Work to Ensure a Place for Themselves in Gaza's 'Day After'  Haaretz
  4. Maintaining ties with Egypt despite signs of hostility  The Jerusalem Post
  5. Egypt warns displacing Gazans a ‘red line,’ would be the end of the ‘Palestinian cause’  The Times of Israel
